description: Detects the execution of some potentially unwanted tools such as PsExec, Procdump, etc. (part of the Sysinternals suite) via the creation of the "accepteula" registry key.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Legitimate use of SysInternals tools. Filter the legitimate paths used in your environnement
name: PUA - Sysinternals Tools Execution - Registry
query: (winlog.event_data.EventType:"CreateKey" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\Active\ Directory\ Explorer* OR *\\Handle* OR *\\LiveKd* OR *\\Process\ Explorer* OR *\\ProcDump* OR *\\PsExec* OR *\\PsLoglist* OR *\\PsPasswd* OR *\\SDelete* OR *\\Sysinternals*) AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\EulaAccepted)
